example.parse: (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV2MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:J تبخل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP علي) (NP (PRON_1S nullp))) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN شراكة) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN انوار) (NP (POSS_PRON_2MS ك)))) (CONJ و) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN أفراح) (NP (POSS_PRON_2MS ك))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الفردوسية)))))

arg.g: the partaking in your heavenly light and joy
